metadata.title: CVE-2021-26318 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A timing and power-based side channel attack leveraging the x86 PREFETCHinstructions on some AMD CPUs could potentially result in leaked kerneladdress space information.

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
